description.raw:
Motivation in issue #29.

My solution tries not to be intrusive into the embedded urdf code (so it can easily be replaced). I have transformed all urdf files we use of it into a static library, use ```visibility=hidden``` for it and after add it as part of libsdformat.

Symbols can be checked using ```nm -D``` or ```objdump -T```. 

The [ABI check report](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-any-abichecker-quantal-amd64/16/API_ABI_report/?) complains about missing symbols, but only related to boost. Looks weird to me.

@po1 it would be nice if you can give a try and confirm that this fix (or not) your problem.
